thread.title: Refugees and asylum-seekers stranded in dire conditions overnight on Croatia/Slovenia border (Amnesty International Australia)
thread.title_full: Refugees and asylum-seekers stranded in dire conditions overnight on Croatia/Slovenia border (Amnesty International Australia) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Refugees and asylum-seekers stranded in dire conditions overnight on Croatia/Slovenia border (Amnesty International Australia)
text: ( Source : Amnesty International Australia ) Croatian and Slovenian authorities must urgently come up with effective solutions as hundreds of refugees and asylum seekers who were stranded overnight between the two countries' border checkpoints
